Seek top score by navigating through tight turns, inversions, steep slopes, and even fire rings. This game is filled with stunning 3D graphics, and the music adds to the excitement and the desire for speed. Challenges will put your wild driving skills to the test.¬†An AI will chase after and combat you to do more fantastic drifts, jumps, and stunts.
